cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.IR. 

This paper deals with natural language processing and sentiment analysis, which are both sub-fields of computer science. The paper proposes a method to transform the sentiment of sentences, which falls under the category of natural language generation. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also uses machine learning techniques such as attention mechanisms and autoencoders, which are commonly used in sub-categories such as cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Additionally, the paper uses word vectors, which are commonly used in sub-categories such as cs.CV (Computer Vision) and cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
